subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Extradition
Copa America (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: José Maria Marin, the former president of the Brazilian soccer federation, had been jailed in Switzerland since May. He was scheduled to be arraigned in Brooklyn on Tuesday.
snippet: José Maria Marin, the former president of the Brazilian soccer federation, had been jailed in Switzerland since May. He was scheduled to be arraigned in Brooklyn on Tuesday.
